subject: Hockey, Ice
Labor and Jobs
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. is seeking a settlement with the players union, which would allow for a 48-game season. Shorter schedules, including 46- or 44-game seasons, are also possibilities.
snippet: The N.H.L. is seeking a settlement with the players union, which would allow for a 48-game season. Shorter schedules, including 46- or 44-game seasons, are also possibilities.
